BODY.p: It has been over 10 years. We are here thanks to the work of 131 developers. 49,124 commits were made just to the ScummVM tree and those turned into a massive 1,085,714 lines of code (comments are not counted) and of course over 7.6MM downloads just from the main site. I would say, those were great ten years.
The outcome is ScummVM 1.4.0 which we are releasing today, 11/11/11 11:11:11.11.

More games are supported: Lands of Lore: The Throne of Chaos (based on same engine as Kyrandia), the kids' game Blue's Birthday Adventure, the SF game Ringworld: Revenge of the Patriarch and practically all supported Sierra SCI games have now their Amiga versions working. Our musically inspired users will MI2 and Indy4 early SCUMM games, CMS support in Loom, MI1 and Indy3, and even Winnie the Pooh got looney tunes!
Of course as always there are many more features and you can find the full list here. And the release itself is on our downloads page.
